name: clamav
description: ClamAV is an open-source antivirus engine designed for detecting malware, viruses, and threats. It can be used on mail servers, endpoints, and containerized environments, and offers a CLI scanner.
features: Antivirus Engine: Open-source malware and virus detection. Comprehensive protection.
Mail Server Protection: Scan email attachments for threats. Secure communication.
CLI Scanner: Command-line scanning for files and directories. Flexible usage.
Regular Updates: Frequent virus definition updates. Current protection.
Cross-Platform: Works on Linux, Windows, and macOS. Universal security.
Container Support: Scan containerized environments. Modern infrastructure.
Open Source: Transparent, auditable security code. Trust through verification.
